data.text:
Description:

In Tijuana, Mexico, Dr. “Sandy” Martinez Castro is a Double-Board-Certified General Surgery Specialist. As a surgeon for Lighter Dream and Body Art Surgical (BAS II) in Baja California’s medical area.

Dr. Sandy Martinez assists patients in losing weight by delivering compassionate, high-quality care. She is a member of several organisations, including:

National Board of Surgery Mexico

National Board of Bariatric Surgery

Baja California Board of Bariatric Surgery

American Society for Metabolic and Bariatric Surgery (ASMBS)

Dr. Sandy, a Tijuana bariatric surgeon, will get recognition from the Universidad Autonoma de Baja California in 2021. After years of helping in general surgery and working with Mexico’s finest bariatric doctors.

Education & Training:

Specialist in General Surgery: Universidad Autónoma de Baja California

Specialization in General Surgery (2005-2009): Hospital General de Occidente. Guadalajara, Jalisco

Medical Doctor: Universidad Autónoma de Baja California

Recognition: Evaluated for Superior Education (2011)

Advanced Laparoscopic Surgery for Obesity (Sep 2020 – Aug 2021): Hospital Angeles Tijuana

Certifications & Memberships:

IFSO: International Federation for the Surgery of Obesity

Feng Academy of Minimally Invasive Surgery (FAMIS)

Mexican Association of Endoscopic Surgery

CMCGA: El Consejo Mexicano de Cirugía General, A.C. (Effective August 13, 2020)

Association Mexicana De Cirugia General

Mexican College for Obesity and Metabolic Diseases

Cost:

The decision to have surgery is a huge one and choosing the appropriate doctor or surgeon is even more critical. Dr. Sandy and her colleagues are highly knowledgeable and experienced in performing procedures. Dr. Sandy towers above the other doctors. She has conducted a number of surgeries at reasonable costs.

Surgeries Performed and Pricing are as follows:
